summary: Misc "food" patches for Farm Animals to make it compatible with Real Needs and Diseases, Harvest Overhaul (Creatures), as well as skybirds - Airborne Perching Birds.
descriptionHtml:
"skyBirds" support was added as Farm Animals adds a goose that conflicts with the goose added by skyBirds - Airborne Perching Birds. Evidently I was totally, and blissfully, unaware of the famous Northern European Perching Goose.  :P

Small patches to add support for Realistic Needs and Diseases, Harvest Overhaul, as well as skybirds - Airborne Perching Birds for the ingestibles introduced in Farm Animals.

The type of ingestibles introduced in FA have been modified to closely reflect similar size and types in RND.

[u]Requires;[/u]
Dawnguard, Heartfire, Dragonborn[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56961/?]
Farm Animals by ianjoseph1986[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26228/?]Realistic Needs and Diseases by persied9[/url]  (well, "highly suggested" as it doesn't so much require RND but makes FA compatible with it and besides there's no reason for this patch if RND is not part of your load order. It will load just fine without RND.)

[u]Optional Requirements;[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16553/?]Harvest Overhaul by Omeletter[/url] (the "Creatures" option)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23771/?]skyBirds - Airborne Perching Birds by steve40[/url]

[b]
[/b][u]Installation;[/u]
Install via your favorite mod manager


[u]Basic Load order:[/u]
Farm Animals.esp
RealisticNeedsandDiseases.esp
Farm Animals - RND Support.esp

(This order keeps the size of the patch to a minimum)


[u]More complicated Load Order;[/u]
Skybirds - Airborne Perching Birds.esp
Farm Animals.esp
HarvestOverhaul.esp
HarvestOverhaulCreatures.esp
Skybirds - Harvest Overhaul Support.esp (adds H.O. Leveled List support (Goose Breast and Down))
HarvestOverhaul_skybirds_patch.esp (available thru H.O. installation, adds Floral support)
Farm Animals - Harvest Overhaul Support.esp
RealisticNeedsandDiseases.esp
(All RND patches)
Farm Animals RND Support
Skybirds - Farm Animals Support.esp (only adds support for the Grilled Goose Breast recipe) *
Skybirds - Harvest Overhaul AIO Support.esp (also adds a support for the leveled item "Feather, Down") **
Cooking Expanded.esp (for the chefs amongst us)
(all patches for Cooking expanded [b]as well as[/b] preceding mods)
HarvestOverhaulCreatures_RND_Animal_Loot_All_DLC.esp

* - Farm Support patch for those using Skybirds with Farm Animals [b]only[/b]
** - Harvest Overhaul Support patch for those using Skybirds with Harvest Overhaul [b]only[/b] as well as Farm Animals
One or the other, both together are redundant.


[b]NOTE![/b]
While these patches can be safely "Bashed" patched Wyre will add back the skyBirds-APB goose breast meat. You'll have some options;
1) Break out TESVedit, find the offending entry and delete the attribute. This is my fav but then all my patches have patches on top of patched patches.
2) Make a Post "Bash patch" patch with the original attributes over-riding the Bash attributes.
3) Ignore the APB meat. The easiest option but not the "cleanest".


[u]Addendum:
[/u]For those using SkyRe - The Skyre.esp should be loaded prior to all of these here. Do not forget the Harvest Overhaul-SkyRe patch. Load the patch between the Creatures.esp and Skybirds-HO patch.
author: Morashtak
